title: Reconnect period
body:
TL:DR i got remaked again because of net problems blah blah blah

Is it just me or have You Riot shortened the reconnect period that is the time the loading screen waits for a player before jumping into the game,because i think that it is a tad bit short,my net cut itself for like 1 minute,im like okay il be there,no worries BOOM 3:17 remake.

The idea is that you extend the loading screen by atleast 1 minute if that is within your power,THAAAANK YOUUUU ;)

replies.body: AFAIK we haven't made any recent adjustments to the period of time you have to get a [**/remake**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686). You still need to be inactive or disconnected for 90 seconds before the 3 minute mark once the game starts.

BAH! Poro you misread my post,my question was : Have you shortened the loading screen wait time for a disconnected player?

THE LOADING SCREEN!

THANK YOU :")
